Heh! :)
=A0
No problem. If you are not sure which sub-faction your characte=
rs will join you will see one labeled: Independents/Unassigned, and can use=
 that. You can look around the place to see what each subfaction stands for=
, and other such info. Also you will want to create a login for yourself, a=
s the site admin doesn't appreciate anonymous creation of characters. 
=A0
=
Preston
=A0

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>Heh! :)</P>
<P> </P>
<P>No problem. If you are not sure which sub-faction your characters will join you will see one labeled: <SPAN class=hl2>Independents/Unassigned, and can use that. You can look around the place to see what each subfaction stands for, and other such info. Also you will want to create a login for yourself, as the site admin doesn't appreciate anonymous creation of characters. </SPAN></P>
